EmailTemplate.description: Training template to send to new and renewal clients that are in need of training for second outreach.
EmailTemplate.name: Consult Outreach - 2nd Touch
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-Up: Cision Training - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} -
I hope your day is going well! I am following-up to my note sent a few days ago. Have you given any thought to scheduling a training on your CisionPoint account? If you (or your team) are interested, could you please reply to this note with the following:
Day/time(s) that you have in mind for the training (the session will last 1 hour)* Your current timezone Areas of CisionPoint that you would like to cover (ex: List Building, Monitoring, etc) How many people will be attending the session
*Please note that our team works on a first come, first served basis. If you are interested in locking-in the above time, please let us know as soon as possible.
I look forward to connecting with you soon!
Best, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
